name: One Big Bossfight!
description:
MADE IN 48 HOURS

Fight against a big boss guy. My main focus was on having a smooth, polished movement system and a fairly long bossfight. If the game doesn't run smoothly on web, then try the executable versions. 

Music By Evan King:

(Menus) Hotline - Evan King

(Game) Runner - Evan King

Controls - 

WASD - Movement

SHIFT - Dash

LEFT CLICK - Attack

R - Restart

... I forgot to add an ESC, oh well, just close it by hitting windows key and closing it...
